stem: Order: dopamine 7.5 mcg/kg/min. Weight 80 kg. Concentration 400 mg/250 mL. What rate in mL/hr?
choices: 18.8 mL/hr
28.1 mL/hr
30 mL/hr
22.5 mL/hr

rationale: 7.5×80=600 mcg/min=0.6 mg/min. Per hour: 0.6×60=36 mg/hr. Concentration: 400/250=1.6 mg/mL. 36/1.6=22.5 mL/hr.
